Put mouse over identifiers to see inferred types 
 1: GHC.Types.Module{-# OPTIONS_GHC -fplugin=LiquidHaskellBoot #-}
 2: {-# LANGUAGE MagicHash #-}
 3: {-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wno-unused-imports #-}
 4: module GHC.Num.Integer_LHAssumptions() where
 5: 
 6: import GHC.Types
 7: import GHC.Num.Integer
 8: import GHC.Types_LHAssumptions()
 9: 
10: 
11: {-@
12: assume GHC.Num.Integer.IS :: x:GHC.Prim.Int# -> {v: GHC.Num.Integer.Integer | v = (x :: int) }
13: @-}
